actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption for purposes of the Federal estate tax.

summary.text: Increases the exemption, under the Internal Revenue Code, for purposes of the Federal estate tax from $60,000 to $120,000. Provides that where there is a gross estate of less than $120,000, a return with respect to such estate need not be filed by the executor.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the exemption for purposes of the Federal estate tax.
